channel.title: google on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in google on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-11
item.description: Google’s Message app can now handle iMessage reactions, challenges Apple with new features (4 minute read) Google rolled out several product updates today, including improvements to Google Messages, Android widgets, Google TV, Google Photos, Nearby Share, Android Auto, and Accessibility features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-07
item.description: Google Stream is what Stadia should have been from the start (3 minute read) Google Stream is a backend cloud gaming technology that Google is pitching to businesses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-02
item.description: Gmail’s next big redesign starts rolling out next week (3 minute read) Google is rolling out its integrated view Gmail redesign next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-15
item.description: Google is building a new augmented reality device and operating system (3 minute read) Google recently hired a lead for its Operating System team for Augmented Reality and posted job listings that indicate that the company is getting serious about AR.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-03
item.description: Google is making its first in-house smartwatch that could launch in 2022 (3 minute read) Google could be launching its first smartwatch in 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-02
item.description: Google announces grab bag of new Android features for the end of 2021 (3 minute read) Google has announced several updates coming to Android that include new widgets for some Google apps, new Android Auto features, and updates for Google Assistant and Google Photos.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-22
item.description: Amazon rolls out in-store pickup for products ordered from local retailers (3 minute read) Local Selling is a new set of services from Amazon that allows local and regional retailers to offer both in-store pickup and fast delivery to nearby customers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-22
item.description: Netflix Releases Free VR Game, Eden Unearthed, On App Lab For Oculus Quest (3 minute read) Netflix has released a VR game on App Lab for Oculus Quest for free.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-24
item.description: TikTok is building its own AR development platform, TikTok Effect Studio (3 minute read) TikTok is building tools to allow developers to build augmented reality experiences and features on its platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-18
item.description: Here’s what’s inside Google’s first-ever retail store (3 minute read) Google has opened its first-ever permanent retail location in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-15
item.description: Apple Watch model for extreme sports reportedly in development (1 minute read) This year’s Apple Watch, likely called the Apple Watch Series 7, will have a faster processor, an updated screen, and ultra-wideband functionality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-11
item.description: Facebook is reportedly working on a Clubhouse copy (1 minute read) Facebook is in the early stages of developing a Clubhouse clone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-28
item.description: Tesla Model S refreshed with a radically redesigned interior and 520-mile range (3 minute read) Tesla has unveiled its long-rumored refresh for its Model S sedan.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-26
item.description: Tesla partners with Samsung on new 5nm chip for full self-driving, report says (2 minute read) A report from Korea says that Tesla is partnering with Samsung to develop a 5-nanometer chip for self-driving.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-05
item.description: Google Workers Publicly Launch Union (4 minute read) Google workers have publicly launched a unionization effort.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-31
item.description: Amazon acquires podcast network Wondery (1 minute read) Podcast network Wondery will soon become part of Amazon Music.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-18
item.description: Amazon jumps into the pharmacy business with online prescription fulfillment, free delivery for Prime members (6 minute read) Amazon Pharmacy has launched in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-12
item.description: YouTube went down around the world, but it’s now fixed (2 minute read) YouTube experienced a worldwide outage for about an hour today.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-21
item.description: Elon Musk Says Autopilot Self-Driving Beta Is Rolling Out Tonight (2 minute read) Tesla’s Full Self-Driving (FSD) will be available in a small closed beta test beginning next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-16
item.description: Google launches a slew of Search updates (3 minute read) Google has released several improvements that use AI to enhance its search engine, Google Lens, and other Search-related tools.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-08
item.description: The Supreme Court hears Oracle v. Google tomorrow—here’s what’s at stake (7 minute read) Oracle v.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-02
item.description: Facebook is opening its experimental predictions app to all users (1 minute read) Forecast, Facebook’s community for crowdsourced predictions and collective insights, is now available for people in the US and Canada to participate in.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-03
item.description: Google proposes new campus billed as a ‘neighborhood’ with homes and shops (1 minute read) Google has unveiled plans to build a new corporate campus in Mountain View, California.
